snippet: While preparing in Nevada for his debate with Mitt Romney, President Obama need only look outside for a reminder that the economy has yet to fully recover.
abstract: Pres Obama is preparing for his debate with Mitt Romney in Lake Las Vegas, a financially battered lakeside resort in Henderson, Nev, that serves as a vivid reminder of the economic distress that still threatens his hopes for re-election; state has been hit harder than almost any other by the housing collapse and has 12.1 percent unemployment, worst in the nation.
lead_paragraph: While preparing in Nevada for his debate with Mitt Romney, President Obama need only look outside for a reminder that the economy has yet to fully recover.

headline.seo: In Struggling Nevada, the President Prepares
headline.main: Stark Backdrop as President Prepares to Debate
headline.print_headline: Stark Backdrop as President Prepares to Debate
